name: Artistic Styles Collection
description: Comprehensive collection of artistic painting and illustration styles
author: Luna Collection Team

oil_painting.name: Classical Oil Painting
oil_painting.base_prompt: oil painting, classical art style, rich textures, visible brush strokes, masterpiece

watercolor.name: Soft Watercolor
watercolor.base_prompt: watercolor painting, soft edges, flowing colors, artistic technique, hand painted

digital_illustration.name: Digital Illustration
digital_illustration.base_prompt: digital illustration, clean lines, vibrant colors, modern art style, concept art

pencil_sketch.name: Pencil Sketch
pencil_sketch.base_prompt: pencil sketch, detailed drawing, graphite on paper, artistic sketch

usage_examples.subject: portrait
usage_examples.full_prompt: oil painting, classical art style, rich textures, visible brush strokes, masterpiece, elderly man portrait, wise expression, detailed wrinkles, professional lighting

usage_examples.subject: landscape
usage_examples.full_prompt: watercolor painting, soft edges, flowing colors, artistic technique, hand painted, mountain landscape, misty morning, soft lighting, peaceful atmosphere
